summary: A collection of pytest test suites that validate the functionality of a genomic primer design library. The tests cover interval clustering, coordinate handling, melting temperature calculation, optimization parameters, oligo properties, primer-like objects, primer picking and scoring, primer pair representation, span operations, and variant lookup, using fixtures and helper utilities to construct test data.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the primer design API by automatically testing edge cases, input validation, computational results, and error handling, thereby supporting robust bioinformatics workflows.
